name: A Missing Salesman
storyline: A missing salesman - This is a short first-person horror game. At first glance it may seem that the game is quite simple, but to understand its meaning you need to go through it carefully to the end. The game has a tense atmosphere, screemers and sharp sounds.
summary: A missing salesman - This is a short first-person horror game (psx/ps1). At first glance it may seem that the game is quite simple, but to understand its meaning you need to go through it carefully to the end. The game has a tense atmosphere, screemers and sharp sounds.
